alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:04PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Golden Valley County through 630 PM MDT... At 603 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Ryegate, or 28 miles southwest of Roundup, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail with heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lavina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
